figure 3 for the fixed strategy case

load libs

```{r}
library(data.table)

library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
```

get data

population activity data

```{r}
# activity data
data_activity <- fread("data_sim/results/data_strategy_gen.csv")
data_activity <- data_activity[
  sim_type == "obligate" &
    regrowth == 0.01
]
```

population klept proportion

```{r}
# get data and filter for weight 5 which is the bias
data_klept_prop <- fread("data_sim/results/data_early_0_100_weight_evolution.csv")
data_klept_prop <- data_klept_prop[sim_type == "obligate" &
  weight_id == 5 &
  regrowth == 0.01]

# get numeric lower
data_klept_prop[, weight_num :=
  stringi::stri_extract_last(weight_value,
    regex = "[-0-9]+\\.\\d{2}"
  )]
data_klept_prop[, weight_num := as.numeric(weight_num)]

# count proportion
data_klept_prop <- data_klept_prop[weight_num < 0,
  list(klept_strategy = sum(weight_prop)),
  by = c(
    "sim_type", "replicate", "regrowth",
    "gen"
  )
]
```


make population activity budget plot with weight evolution

```{r}
fig_activity <-
  ggplot(data_activity) +
  geom_path(
    data = data_klept_prop,
    aes(gen, klept_strategy,
      colour = "p_klept",
      group = replicate
    )
  ) +
  geom_path(aes(gen, value,
    colour = variable,
    group = interaction(variable, replicate)
  )) +
  scale_colour_manual(
    values = c(
      foraging = "navyblue",
      handling = "seagreen",
      stealing = "red",
      p_klept = "darkorange"
    ),
    labels = c(
      foraging = "Foraging",
      handling = "Handling",
      stealing = "Stealing",
      p_klept = "Prop. klept."
    ),
    breaks = c("foraging", "handling", "stealing", "p_klept")
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    # labels = scales::percent,
    breaks = seq(0, 1, 0.25),
    labels = c("0", "0.25", "0.5", "0.75", "1")
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = c(1, seq(10, 50, 10))
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(1, 50),
    ylim = c(0, 1),
    expand = F
  ) +
  kleptomoveMS::theme_custom(grid = T) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.key.height = unit(0, units = "mm")
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Generation",
    y = "Prop. population time",
    colour = NULL
  ) +
  guides(colour = guide_legend(nrow = 2, byrow = TRUE))
```

figure intake

```{r}
fig_intake <-
  ggplot(unique(data_activity,
    by = c("gen", "replicate", "pop_fitness")
  )) +
  geom_path(aes(gen, pop_fitness,
    group = replicate
  )) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = c(1, seq(10, 50, 10))
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(1, 50),
    ylim = c(0, 50),
    expand = F
  ) +
  kleptomoveMS::theme_custom(grid = T) +
  labs(
    x = "Generation",
    y = "Population intake"
  )
```

prepare landscape at 0 and 25

```{r}
# get landscape data
data_land <- fread("data_sim/results/data_landscape_item_count_1_50.png")
data_land <- data_land[sim_type == "obligate", ]
```

plot landscape fixed model

```{r}
fig_land_fixed <-
  ggplot(data_land) +
  geom_tile(aes(x, y, fill = items)) +
  facet_grid(~gen,
    labeller = label_both
  ) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(
    limits = c(1, NA),
    na.value = "white",
    direction = -1
  ) +
  coord_equal(expand = F) +
  kleptomoveMS::theme_custom(landscape = T) +
  labs(fill = "# Items")
```

## Figure 3 Fixed model

wrap figures together

```{r}
figure_3_fixed_model <-
  wrap_plots(
    fig_activity, fig_intake, fig_land_fixed,
    design = "AB\nCC"
  ) +
    plot_annotation(
      tag_levels = "A"
    ) &
    theme(plot.tag = element_text(
      face = "bold",
      size = 12
    ))
```

save figure

```{r}
ggsave(figure_3_fixed_model,
  filename = "figures/fig_03_fixed_model.png",
  height = 150, width = 130, units = "mm"
)
```
